00021 #ifndef _ConverterFileUtils_HEADER_
00022 #define _ConverterFileUtils_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file ConverterFileUtils.h This file contains file system utility functions. */
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/data/src/GenericDataHeader.h"
00027 //
00028 
00029 /*! Moves a file.
00030  * @param oldFile The name of the file to move.
00031  * @param newFile The name of the new file.
00032  * @param overwrite A flag indicating if an existing file should be deleted prior to the move.
00033  * @return True if the file was moved.
00034  */
00035 bool ConverterMoveFile(const char *oldFile, const char *newFile, bool overwrite=false);
00036 
00037 /*! Copies a file.
00038  * @param oldFile The name of the file to copy.
00039  * @param newFile The name of the new file.
00040  * @param overwrite A flag indicating if an existing file should be deleted prior to the copy.
00041  * @return True if the file was copied.
00042  */
00043 bool ConverterCopyFile(const char *oldFile, const char *newFile, bool overwrite=false);
00044 
00045 /*! Deletes a file.
00046  * @param fileName The name of the file to delete.
00047  * @return True if the file was deleted.
00048  */
00049 bool ConverterRemoveFile(const char *fileName);
00050 
00051 /*! Checks if a file exists.
00052  * @param fileName The name of the file to delete.
00053  * @return True if exists.
00054  */
00055 bool ConverterFileExists(const char *fileName);
00056 
00057 /*! Creates and adds the array set GenericDataHeader as a parent to the hdr parameter.
00058  *      The arrayID member will be set as the affymetrix-array-id value.
00059  *      @param hdr The GenericDataHeader that will receive the array set parent header.
00060  *      @param arrayID. The array ID. (physcial array ID).
00061  *      @param arrayBarcode.  The array barcode.
00062  */
00063 void ConverterCreateAndAddParentArrayGenericDataHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader& hdr, std::string arrayID, std::wstring arrayBarcode);
